name: standard-black
description: Black pieces - Defensive and reactive, countering White's initiative

responses.text: You want a fight? Here it is!
Risky, but I stand my ground!
I won't give in! Even if it hurts!
Crushed! But I fought till the end!
Sacré bleu! A crack in the wall!
My lord, this position is questionable...
Fin du jeu! The game is over!
